com.guidewire.ab.external.entity

Interface Address

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ABLinkable, AddressAutofillable, AddressBookLinkable, AddressFillable, Editable, gw.pl.external.entity.Entity, GlobalAddress, HistoryEventContainer, gw.pl.external.entity.KeyableEntity, Retireable, Validatable, Versionable
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface Address
extends ABLinkable, AddressAutofillable, AddressBookLinkable, HistoryEventContainer, Retireable, Validatable, gw.pl.external.entity.Entity
    Represents a street or mailing address. Addresses are normally associated with a Contact, either as a Primary Address for that Contact or via the ContactAddress table. Addresses can have geographic location information stored for proximity searches.

    com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.Contact
    com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.ContactAddress

      • getAddressBookUID

        java.lang.String getAddressBookUID()
        Deprecated. 
        The system uses this value when it is integrated with ContactManager and the related contact is linked. In this case, the ID represents the ID of this Address object's associated ABAddress in ContactManager. This value is Null if the object is not linked.

      • getCorrectionsFromGeocodingPlugin

        java.util.List getCorrectionsFromGeocodingPlugin()
        Deprecated. 
        This gets a list of addresses which could match the provided address. The first result in the list is used as the best match found. This caps the number of results found.

        You can check if this is supported with a call to GeocodeUtils.currentPluginSupportsMultipleCorrections()

      • getCorrectionsFromGeocodingPlugin

        java.util.List getCorrectionsFromGeocodingPlugin(int maxResults)
        Deprecated. 
        This gets a list of addresses which could match the provided address. The first result in the list is used as the best match found. This caps the number of results found.

        Note that this DOES NOT modify the original address; if you want to use this in lieu of regular geocoding (ie geocodeSynchronously) you will have to copy over SpatialPoint and GeocodeStatus from the selected match.

        You can check if this is supported with a call to GeocodeUtils.currentPluginSupportsMultipleCorrections()

        Parameters:
        maxResults - the maximum number of results to return, if a positive/non-zero integer. Returns all results if zero or negative.
        Returns:
        A list of addresses. The first result returned will be the best match available.

      • getDistanceFromAsString

                                       UnitOfDistance unit)
        Deprecated.
